title: Mincemeat flan with orange Chantilly
description: If you’re looking for a way to use up mincemeat this Christmas, give this frosted flan a go slathered in citrus cream.
ingredients: 1 tbsp caster or icing sugar, plus extra for sprinkling
2 tbsp orange liqueur, such as Cointreau or Grand Marnier
1 small orange, finely grated zest only
